channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 09:19 Alarm lifted in Kherson region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 09:19 Alarm lifted in Kherson region. Follow further messages. #Kherson_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 09:19 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 09:19 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 09:00 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk Region
item.description: 🟡 09:00 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community.
